price: ហើយហ្វៀរអោនបានប្រឆាំងនឹងអ្នកនាំសារនោះ។ ដូចេ្នះ យើងបានដាក់ទារុណកម្មគេដ៏ធ្ងន់ធ្ងរ។
arabic: فَعَصَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنُ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُ أَخۡذٗا وَبِيلٗا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: faʿaṣā fir'ʿawnu al-rasūla fa-akhadhnāhu akhdhan wabīlan
